verbs.description: CONCORD , N.H. ( AP ) — President Donald Trump [V: has] made federal funds available in New Hampshire by declaring a major disaster for parts of the state that were hit by a powerful nor'easter .

CONCORD , N.H. ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: made] [ARG1: federal funds available in New Hampshire] [ARGM-MNR: by declaring a major disaster for parts of the state that were hit by a powerful nor'easter] .

CONCORD , N.H. ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] has made federal funds available in New Hampshire by [V: declaring] [ARG1: a major disaster for parts of the state that were hit by a powerful nor'easter] .
CONCORD , N.H. ( AP ) — President Donald Trump has made federal funds available in New Hampshire by declaring a major disaster for parts of the state that [V: were] hit by a powerful nor'easter .

CONCORD , N.H. ( AP ) — President Donald Trump has made federal funds available in New Hampshire by declaring a major disaster for [ARG1: parts of the state] [R-ARG1: that] were [V: hit] [ARG2: by a powerful nor'easter] .
